Heading: Standing with Those in Need
Subheading: Founded in 2018 in Tripoli, Lebanon, we are a charity that serves with dignity, compassion, and integrity.
About_Description: Founded in 2018 in Tripoli, Lebanon, Khitat Al-Ihsan Charity Social Association's mission is to stand with those facing hardship and to serve with dignity, compassion, and integrity. For us, humanitarian aid is more than a charitable act, it is a responsibility born from our shared humanity.
Vision_Description: We work to build a community where everyone has access to food, education, and basic healthcare, without discrimination. From Tripoli, Lebanon, we support those most in need and promote human dignity and sustainable development.
Mission_Description: We strive to alleviate human suffering and uphold human dignity by delivering essential humanitarian assistance and sustainable solutions to the most vulnerable populations affected by crises, through transparent partnerships and effective programs that strengthen resilience and create lasting positive impact.
Who_We_Are_Description:
Khitat Al-Ihsan was born from Al-Ihsan Mother Association and launched with sincere support from Lebanese expatriates in Australia, who united under one cause believing that solidarity makes a difference. As the crises in Lebanon worsened, with rising living costs and the absence of the state, expatriates responded with responsibility and compassion.

Khitat Al-Ihsan Charity Social Association was founded in 2018 in Tripoli, Lebanon, carrying a humanitarian mission to stand with those most in need and to serve them with dignity, compassion, and integrity. Independent of any political affiliation, we believe that humanitarian work is not just charity, but a responsibility rooted in our shared humanity.

From this reality, Khitat Al-Ihsan emerged as a humanitarian response aimed at securing basic living needs, from supporting education and healthcare to standing beside orphans and underprivileged families, to be a hand of giving and hope in times of hardship.
